task.title: How to Properly and Thoroughly Clean the Kitchen
task.shortdesc: These instructions will teach you how to clean dishes, tabletops, tools, and also teach you what materials to clean them with

context.p: Please ignore this task as I know you have cleaned our kitchen so many times over the years. I should not be teaching a master.

step.cmd: Throw away all packages and food that cannot be used in the future
Wrap all usable extra food in saran warp and store in the fridge
Gather all dirty dishes, dirty bowls, dirty utensils, and dirty skillets if any was used into the left side of the sink
Lather the sponge with Dawn dishwash soap and beginning scrubbing the kitchen items
step.info: Be careful of sharp that might be in the pile and keep sharp eye on avoiding getting cut

step.cmd: Scrub hard to get rid of food on the kitchen items with the scouring pad
step.info: Do not scour too hard or you will make marks on the kitchen item

step.cmd: Rinse off the soap on the right side of the sink after scrubbing and set in washing machine to dry
Disassemble the blender's glass top, blades, and lid from the machine
step.info: Do not wash electrical parts of blender

step.cmd: Lather the sponge with Dawn dishwash soap and beginning scrubbing the blender parts
Scrub hard to get rid of food on the kitchen items with the scouring pad
Rinse off the soap on the right side of the sink after scrubbing and set parts in washing machine to dry
Wet paper towels with water and wipe stains off of countertops

substep.cmd: Use a drop of Dawn dishwash soap on wet paper towel if stain on countertop is refusing to come off and wipe again

postreq.p: Make sure the sink's water has been turned off and the lights have been turned off when you leave the kitchen
